core

Class WordProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.WordProcessor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TeluguWordProcessor

    public class WordProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides several operations in the context of single word. This class is expected to work against multiple languages so the implementation should not rely on the assumption that the string contain characters.

    • Field Summary
